"Hello there! It's anniversary time!": "We're planning an event around the idea of looking back over your happy memories!"

"I've been doing my best to ask around and get ideas, but...
I could really use your help!"
"Whatever you can do to lend a hand, I'd appreciate it...!"
"Are you making any progress? I'll wait as long as it takes!"
"You're always so helpful! I'm counting on you this time too, but don't push yourself too hard!"
"Oh, but don't push yourself too hard! It's summer, after all, so make sure to leave yourself time to enjoy it!"
"ARKS is going through tough times right now, but we should be able to put together a celebration that makes people smile!"
"That's why I'm going all in on planning this event. I want everyone to have a good time!"
"Ughh... It's so hot! Summer can be a lot of fun, but I feel like I'm going to melt!"
"Thank you for listening to my requests, but don't forget to take breaks and stay hydrated!"

"今回もイベントやって
みんなで盛大に祝ってパーッと騒いで
楽しい思い出にしたいねっ！"

"準備している間でも
みんなの喜ぶ顔が思い浮かぶから
ワクワクするんだー！"

"あれもこれも、やってみたい……！
イベントの計画で頭がいっぱいだよ！"

"たっくさんのお願いを聞いてくれて
本当に、ほんっとーにありがとう！"

"あれもこれもバッチリ安心！
最高のイベントになる予感がするよ！"

"お祝いムードも
どんどん盛り上げていくから
楽しみにしててねっ！"

"本当に、本当におつかれさまっ！
夏の思い出を飾る最高のイベント……
みんなで楽しんでいきたいねっ！"
